name: Papaya Salad
recipeIngredient: 2 slices lime, plus extra for garnish
2 tablespoons fish sauce (nam pla or nuoc mam)
1/4 to 1/2 teaspoon minced bird's-eye or other very hot green chili
Cilantro leaves and whole green chilies for garnish for garnish

recipeInstructions.text: Soak papaya julienne in water to cover with 2 slices of lime for 15 minutes or longer. Drain.
Combine with other ingredients and mix well. Arrange on plate. Garnish with cilantro leaves, lime slices and green chilies.
